code: import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{CCard,CContainer,CRow,CCol,CCardBody,CCardHeader}from'@coreui/react';import'./App.css';import CreateSpecialist from'./CreateSpecialist';import Specialist from'./Specialist';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[specialists,setSpecialists]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{loadSpecialists();},[]);const loadSpecialists=()=>{fetch('http://localhost:8080/api/specialist',{method:'GET',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}}).then(response=>{return response.json();}).then(data=>{setSpecialists(data);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-light min-vh-100 d-flex flex-row align-items-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CContainer,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CRow,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CCol,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CCard,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CCardHeader,{children:"\u0421\u043F\u0435\u0446\u0438\u0430\u043B\u0438\u0441\u0442\u044B"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CCardBody,{children:[!!specialists.length&&specialists.map(item=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Specialist,{loadSpecialists:()=>loadSpecialists(),item:item,specialists:specialists},item.id);}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CreateSpecialist,{loadSpecialists:()=>loadSpecialists()})]})]})})})})});};export default App;
